hanzi-su-wiki:
頂

Значения

Вершина, верх; носить на голове, быть увенчанным; быть, получать (скромно о себе); есть, пить (скромно о себе)

Мнемоника

Верхняя часть головы 頁, темя. У младенцев долго не зарастает. Расковыряв это место гвоздиком 丁, можно убить дитя. В переносном смысле — вершина всякого предмета.

Варианты

顶
purpleculture_pinyin:
dǐng
apex; crown of the head; top; roof; most; to carry on the head; to push to the top; to go against; to replace; to substitute; to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc); (slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile; classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
вершина; макушка головы; верх; крыша; наиболее; носить на голове; подтолкнуть к вершине; идти против; заменить; заменить; подвергнуться (бомбардировке с воздуха, граду и т. д.); (сленг), чтобы «подтолкнуть» ветку форума, чтобы поднять ее авторитет; классификатор головных уборов, головных уборов, вуалей и т. д.

heisig_keyword: вершина головы, вершина горы, место на голове | вершина головы, вершина горы, место на голове
heisig_chinese_memo: 4 heads brings to mind an image of Mount Rushmore - a mountain with four president heads carved into its crest/summit.
heisig_constituent: place on the head, street, nail, spike, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: The key word is actually a formal metaphor meaning "humble acceptance." Reading off the two primitive elements in the order of their writing, we have: nail . . . head. As in "hitting the nail on the head." Now one presumes that most people can handle metaphors, but if you were to run into a dimwit working in a hardware store who only knew the literal meaning of things, and were to ask him, in your best Japanese, to place on your head a nail, he might miss the point and cause you considerable torment.

встреча на высшем уровне
получить смиренно, есть

koohiiStory1: If I put a street sign on my head what do I get ? A place on the head !
koohiiStory2: NAILS - place directly on the forehead, NAILS - place directly on the forehead, NAILS - place directly on the forehead, 　　　The HEAD ON commercial nails it into your head......
jp_example_words:
頂(いただき): (top of) head, summit, spire
頂く(いただく): receive, take food or drink
頂上(ちょうじょう): top, summit, peak
頂点(ちょうてん): top, summit
jp_readingExamples: 頂く (いただ.く), 頂 (いただき)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Take the street all the way to that geoduck, way up there. When you reach it, you will have made it to the summit. You humbly present the road to the geoduck and bow before it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: There is a giant geoduck at the summit of the mountain, and the street will lead you right there. Imagine the grueling climb up the mountain to the summit. Feel it in your legs, and keep looking at that tall, tall geoduck. Now imagine kneeling those same aching legs humbly to the street below the geoduck.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You are at the top, the summit of everything! You humbly survey your surroundings from the top of the geoduck, only to see someone on the street, running toward you. It is Mrs. Chou (ちょう), and she looks angry.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Anytime you use the street, you're in Mrs. Chou's territory. After detecting you were using her street to reach the geoduck, she started coming after you. Remember, wherever there's a street (radical), Mrs. Chou is not far behind.
Ru_Meaning: place on the head, receive, top of head, top, summit, peak
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 項 (うなじ、コウ пункт, параграф, элемент; терм; затылок).

  • (See もらう・貰う) после деепр. указывает, что действие направлено на лицо, обозначаемое подлежащим (часто — на говорящего)

    • warodai
    山頂さんちょう
  • кн. вершина [горы]
    • warodai
    頭頂とうちょう
  • темя
    • warodai

dǐng: (глаг) нести на голове; поднимать, приподнимать, подпирать; бодаться; справляться; идти против; возражать; подменять
Kanshudo_mnemonic: in the city block (丁) the page (頁) is presented
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Four heads bring to mind an image of Mount Rushmore - a mountain with four president heads carved into its crest/summit.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " page ", " ding " sound. The original meaning is the top of human head. "Said Wen": "Ding, Xi Ye. From page, Ding Sheng." Such as "Yi. Daguo": "Crossing over the top of the head, fierce, no blame." "Colding of the top" means water overflowing the top of the head. Another example is "Han Feizi. Rape, Robbery, and Killing of Ministers: "If you are seeking peace with the law-abiding and non-party ruling officials, you will still be able to use your feet, even less."

" Top " means the uppermost part of the object. Such as "Huainanzi. "Xiuwu": "It is not called the top of the nine days today, but the bottom of Huangquan is the end of the two sides. How can it be fair." "Lun Heng. Talking about Rui": "The creek on the top of the mountain has no rivers and lakes, but there are fish, and the water spirits do it for themselves."

" Top " means head support. For example, in the Northern Song Dynasty Zhou Bangyan's "Biandu Fu": "Its failure also breaks its bones, and its success is crowned and hangs down." The extension expresses support. For example, Chapter 4 of "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters": "What he meant in his heart was that he was afraid that the woman would enter this room before closing the door; because he was afraid that the door would not be closed firmly, he had to use a stone top."

" Top " also means commitment. For example, Chapter 44 of "Journey to the West": "He was the one who burned the fire in my house; he was the one who swept the floor, and he was the one who supported the door." It also means to replace and replace. For example, Ji Yun in the Qing Dynasty, "Yuewei Thatched Cottage Notes": "Those who have the most violent, willing to die for others."

" Top " can be used as an adverb of degree, which is equivalent to the most. Such as "Zhuzi Language Class. Volume Two: "There are many star maps, but it's rare that they look like a round map." The second episode of "The Strange Situation I've Witnessed in Twenty Years": "If you have an important matter at home, you have to take a vacation and go back. Came in three months."

" Ding " can also be used as a measure word, used for utensils with a top. For example, "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 14: "Two large sedan chairs, four small sedan chairs, and four cars, sharing a number of small and small ties, each using a few kilograms of pearl thread." "The Scholars" Chapter 3: " A child born behind, with a yellow face and thin skin, a gray beard, and a ragged felt hat on his head."
humanum_short_description_en: From " page ", " ding " sound. The original meaning is the top of human head.
humanum_full_description:
從「頁」，「丁」聲。本義是人的頭頂。《說文》：「頂，顚也。从頁，丁聲。」如《易．大過》：「過涉滅頂，凶，無咎。」「滅頂」意謂水漫過頭頂。又如《韓非子．姦劫弒臣》：「若以守法不朋黨治官而求安，是猶以足搔頂也，愈不幾也。」

　　「頂」引申表示物體的最上部。如《淮南子．脩務》：「今不稱九天之頂，則言黃泉之底，是兩末之端議，何可以公論乎。」《論衡．講瑞》：「山頂之溪，不通江湖，然而有魚，水精自為之也。」

　　「頂」表示用頭支撐。如北宋周邦彥〈汴都賦〉：「其敗也抉目而折骨，其成也頂冕而垂裳。」引申表示支撐。如《兒女英雄傳》第4回：「他心裏的意思本是怕那女子進這屋裏來，纔要關門；怕門關不牢，纔要用石頭頂。」

　　「頂」又表示承擔。如《西遊記》第44回：「我家裡燒火的，也是他；掃地的，也是他；頂門的，也是他。」還表示代替、頂替。如清代紀昀《閱微草堂筆記》：「有頂凶者，甘為人代死。」

　　「頂」可作程度副詞，相當於最。如《朱子語類．卷二》：「星圖甚多，只是難得似圓圖說得頂好。」《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第2回：「家裏有要緊事，要請個假回去一趟，頂多兩三個月就來的。」

　　「頂」又可作量詞，用於有頂部的器物。如《紅樓夢》第14回：「大轎兩頂，小轎四頂，車四輛，共用大小絡子若干根，每根用珠兒線若干斤。」《儒林外史》第3回：「落後點進一個童生來，面黃肌瘦，花白鬍鬚，頭上戴一頂破氈帽。」
humanum_short_description: 從「頁」，「丁」聲。本義是人的頭頂。

HSK 5: 顶,頂
頂頂RS
顶顶 		top, peak, carry on head, very, receive
  • head 頁 of a man 丁: top, it is receiving every criticism leveled at it
(Simplified: 顶)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 底
Pictophonetic: 丁 indicates the sound; 頁 (head) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 丁 [ dīng ] male adult; robust, vigorous; 4th heavenly stem
    • 頁 [ yè ] page, sheet, leaf
①最高的，最上的及最高最上的部分：頂點。頭頂。山頂。頂巔。頂尖。
②用頭支承：頂承。頂天立地。
③支撐，抵住：頂禮(佛教徒最尊敬的跪拜禮節，兩手伏地，以頭抵住受拜人的腳)。頂門立戶。
④從下面拱起：種子發芽把土頂起來了。
⑤最，極：頂好。頂多。頂大。
⑥相對着：頂風。頂頭。
⑦相當，等於：一個頂倆。
⑧擔當：頂班。不頂事。
⑨代替：頂罪。冒名頂替。
⑩爭辯，衝撞：頂嘴。
⑾量詞，用於某些有頂的東西：兩頂帽子。
⑿到(某個時間)：昨天頂十二點纔到家。
頂多 [ dǐng duō ]: at most; at best
(Simplified: 顶)

As in "hitting the nail on the head." Now one presumes that most people can handle metaphors, but if you were to run into a dimwit working in a hardware store who only knew the literal meaning of things, and were to ask him, in your best Japanese, to place on your head a nail, he might miss the point and cause you considerable torment.

從「 頁 」，「 丁 」聲。本義是人的頭頂。《說文》：「頂，顚也。从頁，丁聲。」如《易．大過》：「過涉滅頂，凶，無咎。」「滅頂」意謂水漫過頭頂。又如《韓非子．姦劫弒臣》：「若以守法不朋黨治官而求安，是猶以足搔頂也，愈不幾也。」 「 頂 」引申表示物體的最上部。如《淮南子．脩務》：「今不稱九天之頂，則言黃泉之底，是兩末之端議，何可以公論乎。」《論衡．講瑞》：「山頂之溪，不通江湖，然而有魚，水精自為之也。」 「 頂 」表示用頭支撐。如北宋周邦彥〈汴都賦〉：「其敗也抉目而折骨，其成也頂冕而垂裳。」引申表示支撐。如《兒女英雄傳》第4回：「他心裏的意思本是怕那女子進這屋裏來，纔要關門；怕門關不牢，纔要用石頭頂。」 「 頂 」又表示承擔。如《西遊記》第44回：「我家裡燒火的，也是他；掃地的，也是他；頂門的，也是他。」還表示代替、頂替。如清代紀昀《閱微草堂筆記》：「有頂凶者，甘為人代死。」 「 頂 」可作程度副詞，相當於最。如《朱子語類．卷二》：「星圖甚多，只是難得似圓圖說得頂好。」《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第2回：「家裏有要緊事，要請個假回去一趟，頂多兩三個月就來的。」 「 頂 」又可作量詞，用於有頂部的器物。如《紅樓夢》第14回：「大轎兩頂，小轎四頂，車四輛，共用大小絡子若干根，每根用珠兒線若干斤。」《儒林外史》第3回：「落後點進一個童生來，面黃肌瘦，花白鬍鬚，頭上戴一頂破氈帽。」
From " page", " ding" sound. The original meaning is the top of human head. "Said Wen": "Ding, Xi Ye. From page, Ding Sheng." Such as "Yi. Daguo": "Crossing over the top of the head, fierce, no blame." "Colding of the top" means water overflowing the top of the head. Another example is "Han Feizi. Rape, Robbery, and Killing of Ministers: "If you are seeking peace with the law-abiding and non-party ruling officials, you will still be able to use your feet, even less." " Top" means the uppermost part of the object. Such as "Huainanzi. "Xiuwu": "It is not called the top of the nine days today, but the bottom of Huangquan is the end of the two sides. How can it be fair." "Lun Heng. Talking about Rui": "The creek on the top of the mountain has no rivers and lakes, but there are fish, and the water spirits do it for themselves." " Top" means head support. For example, in the Northern Song Dynasty Zhou Bangyan's "Biandu Fu": "Its failure also breaks its bones, and its success is crowned and hangs down." The extension expresses support. For example, Chapter 4 of "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters": "What he meant in his heart was that he was afraid that the woman would enter this room before closing the door; because he was afraid that the door would not be closed firmly, he had to use a stone top." " Top" also means commitment. For example, Chapter 44 of "Journey to the West": "He was the one who burned the fire in my house; he was the one who swept the floor, and he was the one who supported the door." It also means to replace and replace. For example, Ji Yun in the Qing Dynasty, "Yuewei Thatched Cottage Notes": "Those who have the most violent, willing to die for others." " Top" can be used as an adverb of degree, which is equivalent to the most. Such as "Zhuzi Language Class. Volume Two: "There are many star maps, but it's rare that they look like a round map." The second episode of "The Strange Situation I've Witnessed in Twenty Years": "If you have an important matter at home, you have to take a vacation and go back. Came in three months." " Ding" can also be used as a measure word, used for utensils with a top. For example, "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 14: "Two large sedan chairs, four small sedan chairs, and four cars, sharing a number of small and small ties, each using a few kilograms of pearl thread." "The Scholars" Chapter 3: " A child born behind, with a yellow face and thin skin, a gray beard, and a ragged felt hat on his head."

Name meaning

dǐng
вм. 顶
Radicals: 丁, 頁  (street, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
Take the street all the way to that geoduck, way up there. When you reach it, you will have made it to the summit. You humbly present the road to the geoduck and bow before it.
There is a giant geoduck at the summit of the mountain, and the street will lead you right there. Imagine the grueling climb up the mountain to the summit. Feel it in your legs, and keep looking at that tall, tall geoduck. Now imagine kneeling those same aching legs humbly to the street below the geoduck.
Reading Mnemonic
You are at the top, the summit of everything! You humbly survey your surroundings from the top of the geoduck, only to see someone on the street, running toward you. It is Mrs. Chou (ちょう), and she looks angry.
Anytime you use the street, you're in Mrs. Chou's territory. After detecting you were using her street to reach the geoduck, she started coming after you. Remember, wherever there's a street (radical), Mrs. Chou is not far behind.
